page.title: 19NEWS & VIEWS-SW BOGNOR REGIS
page.content:
Bognor Regis has 2 main local newspapers,The Observer and The Post and free newspapers such as the The Guardian and The Promoter. The headlines on 27th June 1985 were as follows: { {'Wash-out summer hits traders'. Bognor, although still in the top three of the sunshine stakes, has so far seen little of the sun.Trade at Pubs, Tea Houses and Cafes is being badly hit but Butlin's is booming as usual.
{'Dearer parking fees could affect our {tourist trade'.}A 10p rise in charges has been approved by the local council. Many Bognor residents and visitors that we spoke to felt that the existing charges were already too high and that increasing them further would discourage tourists.
